name: Deep Space Cleaning Simulator 3D
description:
You’re a janitor working at minimum wage at a cargo interstellar ship who just got dumped into outer space. Luckily for you, you have access to state-of-the-art Multipurpose Dice™ with which you will be able to ease your fall into a hostile alien world (a beautiful one though).

Use “A” and “D” or the arrow keys to move horizontally.
Use Z , X, C to choose a die

  • Red usually wins green
  • Green usually wins blue
  • Blue usually wins red

Credits:

  • Aztec_man: Programming, Art 
  • Ceceboki: Programming
  • Dunxter/Adpa: Music, SFX
  • Waygone: Programming

This is our submission to the GMTK 2022 Game Jam (50 hours). The theme was "roll the dice".

Sadly we didn't have enough time to bugfix properly, to implement all our assets and features, but hey, at least the game is playable.
